thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Antero Resources Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.05

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Antero Resources Reports Q1 EPS Of $0.05
text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Antero Resources Corp:
* ANTERO RESOURCES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS
* Q1 REVENUE $1.028 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $914.1 MILLION
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.44
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.05 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.38 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* ANTERO RESOURCES - QTRLY NET DAILY GAS EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION AVERAGED A RECORD 2,376 MMCFE/D (26% LIQUIDS), AN 11% INCREASE OVER PRIOR YEAR PERIOD
* QTRLY LIQUIDS PRODUCTION AVERAGED 102,798 BBL/D, A 4% INCREASE OVER PRIOR YEAR PERIOD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
